title: SHOW VERSIONS IN MODEL command: module_name column in output renamed model_name | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_07 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the module_name column in the output of the SHOW VERSIONS IN MODEL
command is renamed model_name. The content of the column (the name of the model) does not change.
